combolab.title: Combolab: Metro City Edition
combolab.description: A reference app for Street Fighter 6 with frame data and combo creation and sharing.
combolab.intro: Street Fighter 6 Frame Data and Combo Sharing App
combolab.exploreMovesDescription: Get a detailed, up-to-date rundown of all moves and commands (Classic mode only).
combolab.frameDataDescription: Gain an edge over your opponents by understanding the ins-and-outs of frame advantage and disadvantage.
combolab.manageCombosDescription: Manage your own combo list, add notes and other metadata to keep things tidy, and share your favorites on social media!
combolab.privateOfflineDescription: No internet? No problem. Combolab is fully functional offline. It also doesn't gather any of your personal data.
combolab.copyrightNotice: The Street Fighter name, character names, artwork, and move names are all registered trademarks or trademarks of CAPCOM CO., LTD. Combolab is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or specifically approved by CAPCOM CO., LTD.
